title: Owl be seeing you
caption: Flight of the barn owl
desc: It’s World Migratory Bird Day and this year the focus is on the tracking technologies used to follow birds' journeys across the globe, to examine the threats they face along the way. Organisers are following the routes of 12 bird species – including our homepage barn owl.
copyright: Barn owl sitting on a branch (© blickwinkel/Alamy)
